task.title: Make doctor tolerant of missing better-sqlite3

events.content: Treat missing sqlite drivers as warnings when at least one adapter works: Treat missing sqlite drivers as warnings when at least one adapter works

raw.question: Treat missing sqlite drivers as warnings when at least one adapter works
raw.chosen: Treat missing sqlite drivers as warnings when at least one adapter works
raw.reasoning: Doctor should pass when any SQLite adapter is available, even if better-sqlite3 is missing
